typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	as as string
}
source(output(
		id as integer,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		zip as integer,
		Telephone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm:ss'],
	preferredIntegralType: 'integer',
	preferredFractionalType: 'decimal') ~> SourceMockarooPersons
SourceMockarooPersons sink(input(
		PersonID as integer,
		FirstName as string,
		LastName as string,
		email as string,
		gender as string,
		Address as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		zip as integer,
		telephone as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false) ~> DestinationPersonsSQLDB
